name: radicale
description: Radicale is a self-hosted CalDAV and CardDAV server for contact and calendar syncing across devices. Itâ€™s lightweight and easy to deploy with a minimal configuration.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync calendars across devices using the standard CalDAV protocol

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Run on minimal hardware with low memory and CPU requirements

features.title: File
features.description: Store calendars and contacts as simple files without requiring a database

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create separate accounts for family members or team members with isolated data

features.title: Authentication Options
features.description: Secure access with HTTP basic auth, LDAP, or custom authentication backends

features.title: Rights Management
features.description: Control read and write permissions for shared calendars and contact lists
